mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM USER_ACCOUNT

SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 AND SUM(PASSWD_CHK) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS CAN_LOGIN, CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN '該当のIDがありません。' ELSE CASE WHEN SUM(PASSWD_CHK) = 0 THEN 'Passwordが違います。' ELSE 'ログインができます。' END END AS LOGIN_MSG FROM (SELECT USER_ID AS LOGIN_ID, USER_PW AS LOGIN_PWD, CASE WHEN USER_PW = PASSWORD(#{loginPwd}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END PASSWD_CHK FROM USER_ACCOUNT WHERE USER_ID = #{loginId} AND DEL_FLG = '0') AS LOGIN_RESULT
